title: 2026 Firefighter Academy Dates Announced
lede: SJIF&R Announces 2026 Structure/Wildland Firefighting Academy Dates
body:
Hybrid academy with hands-on skills weekends beginning January 3rd. Graduating participants will be fully qualified as structure and wildland firefighters by end of academy March 3rd.

If you are interested, please complete a

[Volunteer Application](https://forms.office.com/Pages/DesignPageV2.aspx?origin=NeoPortalPage&subpage=design&id=j4QiQRfDZ0KcB3xQQVDRva2d14yWAXNFl-Q6Prz2fIRUOFNSWEYyUEsxS0dFNVpITkdEWFg3RklHWCQlQCN0PWcu)

and submit via email or in person to:

San Juan Island Fire & Rescue 1011 Mullis St. Email:Â [kkuetzing@sjifire.org](mailto:kkuetzing@sjifire.org)

Applications must be received by close of business November 26
